CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: As a result , bulk heterojunction - type polymer solar cells based on PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PC 70 BM have broad photocurrent response wavelength range from 300 nm to 1.1 μm.

Let's think step by step.

1. PDTP-DTDPP(Bu)
2. PC 70 BM

These are the Material Names mentioned in the paragraph. PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) is a specific type of polymer, and PC 70 BM is a specific type of material used in the polymer solar cells.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

The Material Names mentioned in the paragraph are:

1. PDTP-DTDPP(Bu)
2. PC 70 BM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: As a result , bulk heterojunction - type polymer solar cells based on PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PC 70 BM have broad photocurrent response wavelength range from 300 nm to 1.1 μm.

Let's think step by step.

1. Bulk heterojunction - type polymer solar cells
2. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu)
3. PC 70 BM
4. Photocurrent response
5. Wavelength range
6. From 300 nm
7. To 1.1 μm.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. Bulk heterojunction - type polymer solar cells
2. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu)
3. PC 70 BM
4. Photocurrent response (can be considered relevant as it is a property related to the solar cells' performance)
5. Wavelength range (can be considered relevant as it is a property related to the light absorption capability of the materials)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Bulk heterojunction - type polymer solar cells |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) |
| PC 70 BM |
| Photocurrent response |
| Wavelength range (from 300 nm to 1.1 μm) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: As a result , bulk heterojunction - type polymer solar cells based on PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PC 70 BM have broad photocurrent response wavelength range from 300 nm to 1.1 μm.

Let's think step by step.

1. Bulk heterojunction - type polymer solar cells
2. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu)
3. PC 70 BM
4. Broad photocurrent response
5. Wavelength range
6. From 300 nm
7. To 1.1 μm.

These are the property values mentioned in the paragraph. The first three entities are the types of solar cells and the polymers used in them. The next three entities describe the properties of the solar cells - broad photocurrent response and the wavelength range from 300 nm to 1.1 μm.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. Broad photocurrent response
2. Wavelength range
3. From 300 nm to 1.1 μm

These are the entities that clearly refer to the values of material properties mentioned in the paragraph. The other entities are not properties but rather types of solar cells and polymers used in them.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Broad photocurrent response |
| Wavelength range |
| From 300 nm to 1.1 μm |
